posts.post_content:
Posted By: Donald Johnson
$400 Delivered.  Appears to be an Amherst College Team from the late 1870's.  Piece has the team names written on the back.  About 3/4" shorter than a N173, same width as a N173.  Nice picture of several ring bats and a nice catcher's mask to boot!  This crew looks like a bunch from Gilligan's Island [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]  Paypal preferred.  Thanks for looking!

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1187456263.JPG[/IMG] 
[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1187456277.JPG[/IMG] 

$350 Delivered.  Was sold to me as being a Harvard team from the late 1870's.  Not sure if it is or not but definitely a team from around the Boston area.  Roughly the same size as a N173.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1187456306.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1187456320.JPG[/IMG]
